name: PURR PAWER
description:
Welcome to PURR PAWER !
Pawllywood is a small and peacefull town where lives our dear Chonk, a special cat .

One day, while Chonk was eating his favorite, delicious fishes, Evil Aliens from outer space showed up to shatter the peace of this small place...

Their goal? Steal all those fishes that Chonk love so much to turn them into fuel!
But be wary, Chonk is not a cat who will back down when it comes to getting rid of those invaders!

Destroy everything on your way and punch those aliens back home with anything that comes in your hand!Have Fun!!
